review:
My 3+ Year old Daughter have ADHD (Hyper Activity) joined Aster before 6 months ago. She had speech delay with behaviour and Vision issues, am happy to see her improvement in speech and behaviour & vision slowly. Staff are really nice and helpfull. And mostly they understand the problem and act according, they treat every child according to thier comfort, there is the list of faculties whom i would like to say thanks to the NeuroKid (Paediatric Neurology) department

1. Speech Theraphy (Mabel) : She join recently few months ago, when last therapist left, we were bit nervous, but to our surprise she is very good with kids. Kids love her and feel very comfortable with her. My daughter started talking now with understanding the meanings. Ofcourse I recommend her. Aster must have her for her talent.

2. Physio (Kritika): That the real gem here. Every kids love her so much that they dont want to come back from her class (in good way). She understand the physology of kids and behaves really down to earth. She is the heart in Neurokid department. Kid love to play with her and learn things. Too good

3. Special Education : Behaviour (Laxmi) : She does her job with love for kids and perfection. She keep everyday record of your kids improvement. She know how to handle any kids. Salute her for her perfection work and patience. She gives time to kids to be comfortable and then starts.

4. Vision Theraphy (Kaushalya / Kiran) : My daughter had vision problem as well. Both the Vision thearaphist is young, smart, talent ed and ofcourse have a lot of pataince to tackle so many kids with different issues. Both of them are the most hard working. Hats Off

5. Psychology (Apoorva) : Thanks to her suggesstion, after we followed the same in home, we can see improvement in my daughter. She try to make the kid understand with very clear speech sound and actions. She is very good in her job

6. Receptionist (Bimbitha B P) : Aster is lucky to have such a smart and helpful lady, who understands problem, issue and help everyone. Behaviour is down to earth and always ready to listen to problem and help.
